DataSourcePortable.Name: Qtde Funil por Fase
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT A.NOME FASE,COUNT(A.NOME) QTDEFASES
FROM K_CRM_FASES A
JOIN K_CRM_PESSOAS B ON B.FASE = A.HANDLE
WHERE B.USUARIOEXECUTIVO = @USUARIO
GROUP BY A.NOME
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="FASE" From="A" Path="FASE" /> <Field Alias="QTDEFASES" From="A" Path="QTDEFASES" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
